subject: Laying of Annual Reports and Audited Accounts of the Authority on the Table of the Houses of Parliament- Recommendation of the Committee on papers laid on the Table
text: H<ri4 7ofl rumnff gfear<ut (Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 (is4 wdett 3ir 7GTH #7ai4) 4777 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QA. !Extn = 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0i+-51v 8, 7ver-10; ERQV, 7 forif - 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No:: 11041/3/2002-Admn 17th June 2010 CIRCULAR Sub: Laying of Annual Reports and Audited Accounts of the Authority on the Table of the Houses of Parliament Recommendallon of the Committee on Papers Laid on the Table (COPLOT): Rajya Sabha reg: Based on the recommendation of the Committee on Papers Laid on the Table (COPLOT) , Rajya Sabha, our circular No. 11041/3/2002-Admn dated 18.12.2009 is partially modified as under: - Activities Revised completion date Finalization/Consolidation of accounts at PIUsJCMUsISLO 1Oth and RO_ Consolidation and Finalization of Annual Accounts at HQ 2Oth June Submission for approval of Annual Accounts before the 25ih June Board of the Authorty- Submission Of approved accounts to C&AG for gudit; 30th June Submission of approved accounts (Un-audited) to Admn: 30th June Division for preparation of Annual Report Likely date of the receipt of audited accounts   from Sth October C&AG 2 All other time schedule remain unchanged: : 3 This issues with the approval of Chairman, NHAI 17 (S.S. Nahar) Chief General Manager (Coord) To: PS to Chairman PS to All Members Dy. Dir.
